info.title: StockX Public API
info.description: Manage StockX seller account using APIs

tags.name: Batch
tags.description: Batch APIs enable a user to create, update, delete listings in bulk. Batch APIs are asynchronous in nature and we provide mechanisms to poll the API so that you can keep track of the batch completion.  Once a batch is successfully completed, you can view the status of each individual listing.  We track each individual listing inside a batch separately so you can have scenarios where some listings succeed and some fail in a single batch.

tags.name: Listings
tags.description: Listings APIs enable a seller to programmatically sell on StockX. The APIs enable a user to  create, update and delete listings on the marketplace, as well as view and fetch live market data for any live or expired listings you have

tags.name: Catalog
tags.description: The StockX Catalog API provides a means for partners to search for catalog data, and request products to be added. Partners can search our Catalog to get StockX product and variant IDs for various purposes. Access to the Catalog Ingestion API is approved on a request-by-request basis.

tags.name: Order
tags.description: Order APIs enable a user to view all their active orders / sales as well as details for a single order.

post.description: Create a new batch of listings

get.description:
Once you are able to create a batch successfully, you need to poll the get batch status API to track the progress of the batch.
This polling is necessary because all batch operations are asynchronous in nature.
get.summary: Batch listings creation - Get Batch Status

parameters.description: Unique Batch ID
parameters.name: batchId

get.description:
Once a batch completes successfully, you need to use the get batch items API to see the results of each item in the batch.
You can also use this API at any point in time after the batch is created to see the progress of each individual item in a batch.

parameters.description: The ID of batch
parameters.name: batchId

parameters.description: Status of listing
parameters.name: status

post.description:
Batch delete listings API allows a user to delete up to 100 individual listings in a single API call.
This API is asynchronous in nature and will return a batchId that you would need to poll using the polling APIs described later.

get.description:
Once you are able to create a batch successfully, you need to poll the get batch status API to track the progress of the batch.
This polling is necessary because all batch operations are asynchronous in nature.
get.summary: Batch listings deletion - Get Batch Status

parameters.description: Unique Batch ID
parameters.name: batchId

get.description:
Once a batch completes successfully, you need to use the get batch items API to see the results of each item in the batch.
You can also use this API at any point in time after the batch is created to see the progress of each individual item in a batch.

parameters.description: Unique Batch ID
parameters.name: batchId

post.description:
Batch update listings API allows a user to update up to 100 individual listings in a single API call.
This API is asynchronous in nature and will return a batchId that you would need to poll using the polling APIs described later.

get.description:
Once you are able to create a batch successfully, you need to poll the get batch status API to track the progress of the batch.
This polling is necessary because all batch operations are asynchronous in nature.
get.summary: Batch listings update - Get Batch Status

parameters.description: Unique Batch ID
parameters.name: batchId

get.description:
Once a batch completes successfully, you need to use the get batch items API to see the results of each item in the batch.
You can also use this API at any point in time after the batch is created to see the progress of each individual item in a batch

parameters.description: Unique Batch ID
parameters.name: batchId

parameters.description: Status of listing
parameters.name: status

post.description:
Seamlessly Integrate Catalog Data into Our Platform.
To create an ingestion job, you need to provide a set of catalog attributes. This API is asynchronous and will return an IngestionID that will require polling.
post.summary: Post - Create a Catalog Ingestion Job (Beta)

get.description:
Monitor Your Data Integration Status.
Once you create an ingestion job successfully, you need to poll the get catalog ingestion API to track the progress, whether the entire job or individual updates.

parameters.description: Unique ID used to return the status of an ingestion job.
parameters.name: ingestionId

parameters.description: The status of the ingestion job. In review, Completed, Rejected.
parameters.name: status

get.description: Get product details API allows you to fetch details for a single product

parameters.description: Unique identifier for a product
parameters.name: productId

400.description: Variant does not belong to the product.

get.description:
Get variant details API allows you to fetch the details of a single variant for a given product.
If the product id doesn't contain the specified variant, a validation error will be returned.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for a product
parameters.name: productId

parameters.description: Unique identifier for a products variant
parameters.name: variantId

get.description: Get product variants API allows you to get all the different variants of a given product.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for a product
parameters.name: productId

get.description:
Get Market Data API allows you to obtain basic market data - the highest Bid and lowest Ask amount for a given variant. If the product id doesn't contain the specified variant, a validation error will be returned.
Note:
  • We have deprecated the country param as the market data will now be based on your market.
  • Based on your region, the response object may vary.
get.summary: Get market data for a variant

parameters.description: Unique identifier for a product
parameters.name: productId

parameters.description: Unique identifier for a products variant
parameters.name: variantId

parameters.description:
The currency code this product is being listed in.

Available values: "AUD", "CAD", "CHF", "EUR", "GBP", "HKD", "JPY", "KRW", "MXN", "NZD", "SGD", "USD"
parameters.name: currencyCode

parameters.description: ISO Alpha-2 code representing the country you need the market data for. If not provided, will default to your country.
parameters.name: country

get.description:
Get Market Data API allows you to obtain basic market data - the highest Bid and lowest Ask amount for all variants of given product. You may notice discrepancies in the values for sellFasterAmount and earnMoreAmount between this and the ‘Get market data for a variant` API. This is because this API does not take into account any live asks you currently have for each individual variant, while the 'Get market data for a variant’ API does.
Note:
  • Based on your region, the response object may vary.
get.summary: Get market data for a product

parameters.description: Unique identifier for a product
parameters.name: productId

parameters.description:
The currency code this product is being listed in.

Available values: "AUD", "CAD", "CHF", "EUR", "GBP", "HKD", "JPY", "KRW", "MXN", "NZD", "SGD", "USD"
parameters.name: currencyCode

get.description:
Search catalog API allows you to search the StockX catalog via freeform text.
The output is a paginated list of products that match the search term provided in the API call.

parameters.description: Specifies a keyword search as a String.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Requested page number. By default, the page number starts at 1.
parameters.name: pageNumber

parameters.description: The number of products to return. By default, the page size starts at 1.
parameters.name: pageSize

post.description:
Create listings API allows you to create new listings.
The listings correspond to an ask in the StockX UI. The listings can be for the same variant ID.

get.description: Get all listings API allows you to fetch all existing listings. Multiple filters are available.

parameters.description: Requested page number. By default the page number starts at 1
parameters.name: pageNumber

parameters.description: The number of listings to return. By default the page size starts at 1.
parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description: Comma separated list of ids. This field must not include array brackets `[]` or quotation marks (" " | ' ').
parameters.name: productIds

parameters.description: Comma separated list of ids. This field must not include array brackets `[]` or quotation marks (" " | ' ').
parameters.name: variantIds

parameters.description: Comma separated list of ids. This field must not include array brackets `[]` or quotation marks (" " | ' ').
parameters.name: batchIds

parameters.description: Start date of the query
parameters.name: fromDate

parameters.description: End date of the query
parameters.name: toDate

parameters.description:
Comma separated list of listing statuses. This field must not include array brackets `[]` or quotation marks ("" | '').

Available values: "INACTIVE", "ACTIVE", "DELETED", "CANCELED", "MATCHED", "COMPLETED"
parameters.name: listingStatuses

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of inventory type(s). This field must not include array brackets [] or quotation marks ("| ''). The inventory types are STANDARD, FLEX or DIRECT.
parameters.name: inventoryTypes

parameters.description: The shipment's unique display id associated with the listing. Note: This is the same ID generated when a Flex inbound list is created in StockX Pro.
parameters.name: initiatedShipmentDisplayIds

put.description: Activate listing API allows you to activate a listing. A listing is active when it contains an available ask.

parameters.description: Unique ID for this listing
parameters.name: listingId

put.description: Deactivate listing API allows you to deactivate a listing. A listing is deactivated when it doesn't have an ask or when it contains an expired ask.

parameters.description: Unique ID for this listing
parameters.name: listingId

patch.description: Operation used to update an existing listing by its ID.

parameters.description: Unique ID for this listing
parameters.name: listingId

delete.description: Operation used to delete an existing listing by its ID.

parameters.description: Unique ID for this listing
parameters.name: listingId

get.description: Get a listing API allows you to get a listing by its ID.

parameters.description: Unique ID for this listing
parameters.name: listingId

get.description: Get listing operation API allows you to fetch a listing operation by listing ID and operation ID

parameters.description: Unique ID for this listing.
parameters.name: listingId

parameters.description: Unique ID for this operation.
parameters.name: operationId

get.description: Get all listing operations API allows you to fetch a paginated list of single listing with all operations.

parameters.description: Unique ID for this listing
parameters.name: listingId

parameters.description: Requested page number. Starts at 1.
parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description: The cursor to use as a starting point
parameters.name: cursor

get.description:
Get all active orders API allows you to view all their active orders in the StockX marketplace.
An order is considered active from the time it was created to the time the product was received and authenticated by StockX and the seller is paid out.

parameters.description: The number of page
parameters.name: pageNumber

parameters.description: Requested page number. Starts at 1
parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description:
To filter your Orders by a given order status

Available values: "CREATED", "CCAUTHORIZATIONFAILED", "SHIPPED", "RECEIVED", "AUTHENTICATING", "AUTHENTICATED", "PAYOUTPENDING", "PAYOUTCOMPLETED", "SYSTEMFULFILLED", "PAYOUTFAILED", "SUSPENDED"
parameters.name: orderStatus

parameters.description: Unique identifier for a product
parameters.name: productId

parameters.description: Unique identifier for a products variant
parameters.name: variantId

parameters.description: The field by which the results are sorted. Defaults to "CREATEDAT" and can also accept "SHIPBYDATE".
parameters.name: sortOrder

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of inventory type(s). This field must not include array brackets [] or quotation marks ("| ''). The inventory types are STANDARD, FLEX or DIRECT.
parameters.name: inventoryTypes

parameters.description: The shipment's unique display id associated with the order. Note: This is the same ID generated when a Flex inbound list is created in StockX Pro.
parameters.name: initiatedShipmentDisplayIds

get.description: Get all historical orders. Multiple filters are available.

parameters.description: The start date of when the orders were created. Format is YYYY-MM-DD.
parameters.name: fromDate

parameters.description: The end date of when the orders were created. Format is YYYY-MM-DD.
parameters.name: toDate

parameters.description: The requested page number. By default the page number is 1
parameters.name: pageNumber

parameters.description: The number of orders to be returned. By default the number is 10
parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description:
To filter your Orders by a given order status

Available values: "AUTHFAILED", "DIDNOTSHIP", "CANCELED", "COMPLETED", "RETURNED"
parameters.name: orderStatus

parameters.description: Unique StockX product ID
parameters.name: productId

parameters.description: Unique StockX variant ID
parameters.name: variantId

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of inventory type(s). This field must not include array brackets [] or quotation marks ("| ''). The inventory types are STANDARD, FLEX or DIRECT.
parameters.name: inventoryTypes

parameters.description: The shipment's unique display id associated with the order. Note: This is the same ID generated when a Flex inbound list is created in StockX Pro.
parameters.name: initiatedShipmentDisplayIds

get.description:
Get order details API allows you to fetch details for a single order by order number.
This includes shipping and payout information.

parameters.description: The unique order number. Standard example: 323314425-323214184. Flex example: 02-L0QT6MRVSG
parameters.name: orderNumber

get.description: Get an existing shipping document.

parameters.description: The number of order to fetch
parameters.name: orderNumber

parameters.description: The shipping ID of order to fetch
parameters.name: shippingId

get.description: Get shipping documents for an order. This endpoint only supports Direct order types.

parameters.description: The number of order to fetch
parameters.name: orderNumber

BatchStatusCounts.description:
The number of items in this batch grouped by their statuses.
This is a short-hand way to quickly introspect how many items are still enqued, how many succeeded or how many failed in a batch.

createdAt.description: when this batch was created in UTC. Represented as ISO 8601 format like 2021-11-09T12:44:31.000Z

updatedAt.description: When this batch was last updated in UTC. Represented as ISO 8601 format like 2021-11-09T12:44:31.000Z

totalItems.description: Total number of items in this batch

itemStatuses.description:
The number of items in this batch grouped by their statuses.
This is a short-hand way to quickly introspect how many items are still enqued, how many succeeded or how many failed in a batch.

inventoryType.description: The inventory this product is being listed in. If not provided, it will default to STANDARD.

active.description: Flag used to indicate that the listing should be active or not

quantity.description: The total number of Listings that need to be created.

currencyCode.description:
The currency this Listing is being listed in. If not provided, it will default to USD.

Available values: "AUD", "CAD", "CHF", "EUR", "GBP", "HKD", "JPY", "KRW", "MXN", "NZD", "SGD", "USD"

variantId.description: Unique StockX variant ID that this Listing is being created for

expiresAt.description: UTC timestamp representing when this Listing should auto-expire.  If not provided, it will default to 365 days from today. Represented as ISO 8601 format like 2021-11-09T12:44:31.000Z

amount.description: The amount this Listing is being listed for

items.description: An array of items that should be associated with the batch

completedAt.description: When this batch fully completed. Represented as ISO 8601 format like 2021-11-09T12:44:31.000Z

createdAt.description: When this batch was created. Represented as ISO 8601 format like 2021-11-09T12:44:31.000Z

updatedAt.description: When this batch was last updated. Represented as ISO 8601 format like 2021-11-09T12:44:31.000Z

totalItems.description: Total number of items in this batch

itemStatuses.description:
The number of items in this batch grouped by their statuses.
This is a short-hand way to quickly introspect how many items are still enqued, how many succeeded or how many failed in a batch

currencyCode.description:
The currency code for this listing

Available values: "AUD", "CAD", "CHF", "EUR", "GBP", "HKD", "JPY", "KRW", "MXN", "NZD", "SGD", "USD"

expiresAt.description: When this listing expires in UTC

amount.description: The amount this listing is listed for

listingInput.description: The input for this item that was used when creating the batch

askId.description: The unique askId of this listing.

listingId.description: The unique listingId of this listing. This is a new ID being introduced that is analogous to askId

result.description: If an item was successfully processed, the result object will contain the following:

error.description: If an item failed to process, the error attribute will contain the error message describing the reason the item failed to process

items.description: An array of items associated with the listing

itemStatuses.description: The number of items in this batch grouped by their statuses. This is a short-hand way to quickly introspect how many items are still enqued, how many succeeded or how many failed in a batch

listingId.description: Unique listing ID that needs to be deleted

The currency code for this listing

Available values: "AUD", "CAD", "CHF", "EUR", "GBP", "HKD", "JPY", "KRW", "MXN", "NZD", "SGD", "USD"

result.description: If an item was successfully processed, the result object will contain the following

error.description: If an item failed to process, the error attribute will contain the error message describing the reason the item failed to process

items.description: An array of items associated with the listing

ingestionId.description: Unique ID used to return the status of an ingestion job.

category.description: A string that specifies product category. Valid values: "sneakers, shoes, apparel, accessories, collectibles, electronics, trading cards"

productTitle.description: A string that uniquely identifies the name of the product.

productImages.description: Public facing links to the products image.

variants.description: The product variants available to sell. For example, for sneakers, each different size is a different variant or for electronics like iPhone, each different storage capacity is a different variant.

countryOfOrigin.description: The country in which the product was manufactured in ISO Alpha 2 Format.

partnerProductId.description: An external ID that partners will use to reference an internal StockX catalog item if approved. Note that this is the higher level product id, not the variantId.

tags.description: A list of attributes or short descriptors associated with the product.

colorway.description: The combinations of colors in which the product is designed. Ex VIOLET ORE/MEDIUM ASH-BLACK-MUSLIN-BURGUNDY CRUSH.

gtin.description: The products global trade item number. Length must be 8, 12, 13, 14 or 18.

styleCode.description: The Style Code for the product  @example "M990BK5"

productDescription.description: Open text field used for describing the product to the customer.

dimensions.description: A string of the dimensions of the product. @example "2/"x4/"x6/""

items.description: An array of items associated with the ingestion job.

title.description: A string that uniquely identifies the name of the product.

variantId.description: Unique identifier for the product variant.

ingestionId.description: Unique ID used to return the status of an ingestion job.

status.description: The status of the ingestion job. In review, Completed, Rejected.

partnerProductId.description: The external partner ID provided in the request.

rejectionDetails.description: The details about its rejection if REJECTED

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the resource was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the resource was last updated.

name.description: The display name for the size conversion

type.description: The type of the size conversion

productType.description: The type of product categories that are available on StockX

title.description: A string that uniquely identifies the product name.

season.description: The season the product was released

releaseDate.description: The date the product was released

retailPrice.description: The retail price of the product.

colorway.description: The combinations of colors in which the product is designed

productAttributes.description: Object containing the attributes of the product.

availableConversions.description: The available size chart conversions this product has

defaultConversion.description: The default sizing this product uses

sizeChart.description: Size chart information for the product

isFlexEligible.description: Indicates if the variant is eligible for flex fulfillment

isDirectEligible.description: Indicates if the variant is eligible for direct fulfillment

size.description: The size of this size conversion

type.description: The type of the size conversion/chart

variantId.description: Unique identifier for a products variant

availableConversions.description: The available size conversions for this variant

defaultConversion.description: The default sizing information for this variant

sizeChart.description: Size chart related information for this variant

isFlexEligible.description: Indicates if the variant is eligible for flex fulfillment

isDirectEligible.description: Indicates if the variant is eligible for direct fulfillment

variantId.description: Unique identifier for a products variant

availableConversions.description: The available size conversions for this variant

defaultConversion.description: The default sizing information for this variant

sizeChart.description: Size chart related information for this variant

isFlexEligible.description: Indicates if the variant is eligible for flex fulfillment

isDirectEligible.description: Indicates if the variant is eligible for direct fulfillment

variantId.description: Unique identifier for this product variant

currencyCode.description:
The currency code. If not provided, it will default to USD. Only valid currencies supported on stockx.com are supported via API.

Available values: "AUD", "CAD", "CHF", "EUR", "GBP", "HKD", "JPY", "KRW", "MXN", "NZD", "SGD", "USD"

lowestAskAmount.description: The lowest ask for the product variant listed in the country requested.

highestBidAmount.description: The highest bid for the product variant listed in the country requested.

sellFasterAmount.description: The price you have to list at, inclusive of duties and taxes, to become the lowest Ask to buyers in the United States.

earnMoreAmount.description: The price you have to list at, to become the lowest ask to buyers in your region. This accounts for VAT and taxes.

flexLowestAskAmount.description: The Flex program's lowest ask for the product variant listed in the country requested.

currencyCode.description:
The currency code this product is being listed in. If not provided, it will default to USD. Only valid currencies supported on stockx.com are supported via API

Available values: "AUD", "CAD", "CHF", "EUR", "GBP", "HKD", "JPY", "KRW", "MXN", "NZD", "SGD", "USD"

expiresAt.description: UTC timestamp representing when this Ask should auto-expire.  If not provided, it will default to 365 days from today.  Represented as ISO 8601 format like 2021-11-09T12:44:31.000Z
